Aug. 22, 1903 D Blakesley Contest
Blakesley Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
blakesley-contest
None
Le Domino Noir [arr. Swift]
Blakesley Hall, Blakesley, Northamptonshire, England, UK Promoted by Blakesley Silver Prize Band
Best cornet - J.E.Fidler - Earls Barton. Best horn, trombone and euphonium - Rushden Temperance. Best baritone - Northampton Temperance. March contest - 1st Rushden, 2nd Wombwell. 5 bands competed.
June 20, 2013, 11:15 a.m. Aug. 9, 2016, 8:12 a.m.
1 Rushden Windmill Band Charles Harry Baker
2 Earls Barton Band J. E. Fidler
2 Northampton Temperance Jeremiah Holdsworth
4 Wombwell Temperance Major Hitchen
5 Long Buckby Town Silver Arthur Muddiman
